div.bibl: Record Books of the Chicago Lithuanian Savings and Loan Society, in possession of Secretary, Chicago Lithuanian Savings and Loan Society, 6812 S. Washtenaw Ave., Chicago, Ill.

body.p: The Chicago Lithuanian Savings and Loan Society was organized in December, 1925. The first organizers were: A. Dargis, J. Brunzas, J. Kratkus, B. Mastauskas, M. Marvides, S. Shambards.
The capital is $1,000,000. The assets are $45,000.
B. Nemartonis, president 6540 S. Campbell Ave.
A. Valonis, secretary, 2201 W. Cermak Rd.
A. Dargis, treasurer, 2425 W. Marquette Rd.
